channel.title: Hey, I'm Kacper from Scrapbook
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm surprised I found this great community only now!
I'm a growth marketer currently working full-time at Prowly PR software (prowly.com), leading a small team of 2. Before that, I got some agency experience at Ladder.
My latest (and first) side-project that I'm mostly focused on right now is Scrapbook (getscrapbook.com) which is a database of over 250 growth tactics that I've been collecting for the last 2 years or so. Initially, it was for personal use only, but after sharing it with some friends and getting great feedback, I decided to create a product out of it.
Looking forward to some meaningful conversations with other bootstrappers!

item.title: Hey, I'm Kacper from Scrapbook
item.dc:creator: KacperStaniul
item.description:
Hey guys,

I’m surprised I found this great community only now!

I’m a growth marketer currently working full-time at Prowly PR software (prowly.com), leading a small team of 2. Before that, I got some agency experience at Ladder.

My latest (and first) side-project that I’m mostly focused on right now is Scrapbook (getscrapbook.com) which is a database of over 250 growth tactics that I’ve been collecting for the last 2 years or so. Initially, it was for personal use only, but after sharing it with some friends and getting great feedback, I decided to create a product out of it.

Looking forward to some meaningful conversations with other bootstrappers!
